name: FireSpice
description:
Game Type: 2D side scroller, magic and wizard 

Story:

In the game, you start on a mystical new planet where you have to parkour and defeat the evil zombies and skeletons to get across. Between the two levels you have to navigate carefully and win once you complete the second level. 

  1. Instructions on how to play   (what buttons to press, what to try to do, what to avoid, etc)
  • Arrows or WASD to move left and right
  • E to shoot fireball
  • Jump with space, some places can double jump 
  • Enemies, spikes, and falling off the maps damage and kill you
